name: The Side Project
description:
This game was made for the IGJ Summer 2021 game jam! It's not super incremental, but fits the "running out of" theme pretty well! This game is the first one made in TMT-X, an engine I'm making based off TMT!

Follow the mundane story of a mundane game developer as he works on a side project.

Ultimately a lot of time got spent on the engine/mechanics, so the content got the short end of the stick. I hope you enjoy the game despite that fact!

Discuss the game below or by making a post on The Modding Tree forums!

Also, the game is open source!
